::Shadow Wing::

She heard a strange voice. It was faint, and she could barely 
understand it. She jumped and was so happy just to know that there 
was another presence there. Then she suddenly realized that is knew 
her name. She felt frightened. "Who are you? Are you the Matrix? HAve 
I died and found my way to the Matrix? How did you know my name? 
Where's Lunarpine? What's going on?"  Her thought went onto a million 
directions at once and felt fearfull that she would never see 
Lunarpine again.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Veratis watched the spikes increase it was definately stable, and 
> very much alive. he tried to understand it, adjusting the receptors 
> as he worked. he stepped around to his main console. "Shadow Wing I 
> presume? Can you understand me?" He couldn't quite understand what 
he 
> was hearing but there was always the chance that the protoform 
could 
> still hear.
>
